mapper.select: SELECT P.PA_NO, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_PH, P.PA_ADD1, P.PA_ADD2, P.PZ_ZIP, P.PA_NOKNM, P.PA_NOKPH, P.PA_BLD_TYPE, P.PA_INSR_YN, P.PA_ADM_DT, P.PA_HEIGHT, P.PA_WEIGHT, C.CLINIC_NO, C.CLINIC_OPINION, AC.ADMI_NO, AC.ADMI_REASON FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN CLINIC_CHART C ON P.PA_NO = C.PA_NO LEFT JOIN ADMISSION_CHART AC ON P.PA_NO = AC.PA_NO AND ADMI_OUTDT IS NULL WHERE P.PA_ADM_DT IS NOT NULL AND P.PA_ADM_DT = 'AMYN03'

SELECT P.PA_NO, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_PH, P.PA_ADD1, P.PA_ADD2, P.PZ_ZIP, P.PA_NOKNM, P.PA_NOKPH, P.PA_BLD_TYPE, P.PA_INSR_YN, P.PA_ADM_DT, P.PA_HEIGHT, P.PA_WEIGHT, C.CLINIC_NO, C.CLINIC_OPINION, AC.ADMI_REASON FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN CLINIC_CHART C ON P.PA_NO = C.PA_NO LEFT JOIN ADMISSION_CHART AC ON P.PA_NO = AC.PA_NO AND ADMI_OUTDT IS NULL WHERE P.PA_ADM_DT IS NOT NULL AND P.PA_ADM_DT = 'AMYN04'

SELECT A.PA_NO, A.PA_REG, A.PA_NAME, A.PA_SEX, A.PA_PH, A.PA_ADD1, A.PA_ADD2, A.PZ_ZIP, A.PA_NOKNM, A.PA_NOKPH, A.PA_BLD_TYPE, A.PA_INSR_YN, A.PA_ADM_DT, A.PA_HEIGHT, A.PA_WEIGHT, B.ADMI_NO, B.ADMI_INDT, B.ADMI_EXP_OUTDT, B.ADMI_REASON FROM PATIENT A LEFT JOIN ADMISSION_CHART B ON A.PA_NO = B.PA_NO WHERE A.PA_NO = #{paNo} ORDER BY B.ADMI_NO DESC

SELECT A.PA_NO, A.PA_ADM_DT, B.CLINIC_NO, B.CLINIC_OPINION, B.EMP_NO, B.CLINIC_DT, C.EMP_NAME FROM PATIENT A JOIN CLINIC_CHART B ON A.PA_NO = B.PA_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON B.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE A.PA_NO = #{paNo} AND A.PA_ADM_DT = #{paAdmDt} ORDER BY B.CLINIC_DT DESC

SELECT A.ADRM_ROOMNO, A.ADRM_BEDNO, A.PA_NO, B.PA_NAME, B.PA_NOKNM, B.PA_NOKPH, B.PA_INSR_YN, C.ADMI_NO, C.ADMI_INDT, C.ADMI_EXP_OUTDT, C.ADMI_OUTDT, C.ADMI_FILE, C.EMP_NO, C.ADMI_REASON, D.EMP_NAME, D.EMP_DEPT_CD FROM ADMISSION_ROOM A JOIN PATIENT B ON A.PA_NO = B.PA_NO JOIN ADMISSION_CHART C ON A.PA_NO = C.PA_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON C.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO ORDER BY C.ADMI_NO DESC

SELECT A.ADRM_ROOMNO, A.ADRM_BEDNO, A.PA_NO, B.PA_NAME, C.ADMI_NO, C.EMP_NO, D.EMP_NAME FROM ADMISSION_ROOM A JOIN PATIENT B ON A.PA_NO = B.PA_NO JOIN ( SELECT PA_NO, ADMI_NO, EMP_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PA_NO ORDER BY ADMI_NO DESC) AS rn FROM ADMISSION_CHART ) C ON A.PA_NO = C.PA_NO AND C.rn = 1 JOIN EMPLOYEE D ON C.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'AN' || NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(ADMI_NO), 3) + 1, '0000')), '0001') AS ADMI_NO FROM ADMISSION_CHART
INSERT INTO ADMISSION_CHART (ADMI_NO, ADMI_INDT, ADMI_EXP_OUTDT, PA_NO, ADMI_REASON) VALUES(#{admiNo}, #{admiIndt}, #{admiExpOutdt}, #{paNo}, #{admiReason})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PA_NO, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_PH, P.PA_ADD1, P.PA_ADD2, P.PZ_ZIP, P.PA_NOKNM, P.PA_NOKPH, P.PA_BLD_TYPE, P.PA_INSR_YN, P.PA_ADM_DT, P.PA_HEIGHT, P.PA_WEIGHT, C.CLINIC_NO, C.CLINIC_OPINION, AC.ADMI_REASON FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN CLINIC_CHART C ON P.PA_NO = C.PA_NO LEFT JOIN ADMISSION_CHART AC ON P.PA_NO = AC.PA_NO AND ADMI_OUTDT IS NULL WHERE P.PA_ADM_DT IS NOT NULL AND P.PA_ADM_DT = 'AMYN03' OR PA_ADM_DT = 'AMYN04'

SELECT A.PA_NO PA_REG, PA_NAME, PA_SEX, PA_PH, PA_ADD1, PA_ADD2, PZ_ZIP, PA_NOKNM, PA_NOKPH, PA_BLD_TYPE, PA_INSR_YN, PA_ADM_DT, PA_HEIGHT, PA_WEIGHT FROM ADMISSION_ROOM A JOIN PATIENT P ON A.PA_NO = P.PA_NO
SELECT P.PA_NO, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_PH, P.PA_ADM_DT FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN ADMISSION_CHART AC ON AC.PA_NO = P.PA_NO

SELECT P.PA_NO, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_PH, P.PA_ADM_DT FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN ADMISSION_CHART AC ON AC.PA_NO = P.PA_NO WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AC.ADMI_INDT) = #{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM AC.ADMI_INDT) = #{month}
